channel.title: K Fold Cross Validation on Sina's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in K Fold Cross Validation on Sina's Blog

item.title: A Helper Method for Performing K-Fold Cross Validation
item.description: The following method is a utility method for creating the K divisions upon which one is going to perform the K-fold cross validation operation. The input of the method is the length of the training data, and the number K. The output conveys which indices of the training-data is to be put in each division.
